# SkinIQ - AI 피부 진단 플랫폼 - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
SkinIQ is an AI-powered skin diagnosis platform with patient portal (SkinIQ) and doctor dashboard (SkinIQ Doctor).

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Node.js + Express + MySQL
- Frontend: React (Patient Portal - SkinIQ)
- Admin: React (Doctor Dashboard - SkinIQ Doctor)
- Authentication: JWT
- AI: Google Gemini API
- File Upload: Multer + Cloudinary

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Express API server
- `/patient-portal` - React app for patients (SkinIQ)
- `/admin-dashboard` - React app for doctors (SkinIQ Doctor)
- `/android-app` - Android app for patients
- `/android-app-admin` - Android app for doctors

## Development Guidelines
- Use Korean for user-facing content
- Follow REST API conventions
- Implement proper error handling
- Secure patient data with authentication
- Validate all inputs
